hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
set +x
export current_date="$(date +"%F_%T")" export agent_version="$(git describe --abbrev=0 --tags)" export cdnHost="cdn.subutai.io" export release=""
export LC_ALL=C.UTF-8 export LANG=C.UTF-8
cd ../ git clone https://github.com/happyaron/subutai-agent cp -r subutai-agent/debian/ agent/ echo "Copied debian directory" export CWD="$(pwd)"
echo 'VERSION is ${agent_version}' echo ${CWD} cd ${CWD}/agent && sed -i 's/quilt/native/' debian/source/format cd ${CWD}/agent && sed -i 's/@cdnHost@/${cdnHost}/' debian/tree/agent.conf dch -v '${agent_version}' -D stable 'Test build for ${agent_version}' 1>/dev/null 2>/dev/null
echo "Build package ................." cd ${CWD}/agent dpkg-buildpackage -rfakeroot cd ${CWD} || exit 1 for i in *.deb; do echo '\$i:'; dpkg -c \$i; done
echo "Uploading ....................." cd ${CWD} touch uploading_agent scp uploading_agent subutai*.deb dak@deb.subutai.io:incoming/${release}/ ssh dak@deb.subutai.io sh /var/reprepro/scripts/scan-incoming.sh ${release} agent
